dc_description_s: Prepared in 1923 and 1924 in cooperation with the geologists of Okalhoma, ... ; the oil companies of Oklahoma; and the Oklahoma Geological Survey."; "Compiled from published maps, unpublished maps in the records of the United States and Oklahoma Geological Surveys, data furnished by oil companies and consulting geologists, and field data obtained by H.D. Miser."; Includes "Key map showing the sources of information from which the geologic map was compiled.|78 x 158 Centimeters, sheets 92 x 87 Centimeters|Scale 1:500,000|General Map Collection
